# Revered Ancestor (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* | Spirits of the Past |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Power:** You gain [[Exotic Weapon Proficiency (Feat)|Exotic Weapon Proficiency]] (Valenar double scimitar) as a bonus feat. If you already possess that feat, you gain [[Weapon Focus (Feat)|Weapon Focus]] (Valenar double scimitar) instead.

**Revered Ancestor Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Magic Weapon (Spell)|Magic Weapon]]****:** Weapon gains +1 bonus.

**2** **[[Aid (Spell)|Aid]]****:** +1 on attack rolls and saves against fear, 1d8 temporary hp +1/level (max +10).

**3** **[[Heroism (Spell)|Heroism]]****:** Gives +2 on attack rolls, saves, skill checks.

**4** **[[Spirit Steed (Spell)|Spirit Steed]]****:** Channels an ancient spirit into your steed, increasing its speed and granting other benefits.

**5** **[[Glimpse of Eternity (Spell)|Glimpse of Eternity]]****:** Target takes 1d6 nonlethal damage/level and is [[Confused|confused]].

**6** **[[Heroism, Greater (Spell)|Heroism, Greater]]****:** Gives +4 bonus on attack rolls, saves, skill checks; immunity to fear; temporary hp.

**7** **[[Vision (Spell)|Vision]]** **<sup>MX</sup>:** As *[[Legend Lore (Spell)|legend lore]]**,* but quicker and more strenuous.

**8** **[[Earthquake (Spell)|Earthquake]]****:** Intense tremor shakes 5-ft./level radius. (Valenar call this spell *thundering hooves*.)

**9** **[[Hero's Blade (Spell)|Heroâ€™s Blade]]****:** Channel the spirit of a great hero into a melee weapon.
